prompt: Write an inspirational quote about be-yourself
response: "“Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.”" - Oscar Wilde

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about best
response: "“I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.”" - Marilyn Monroe

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about human-nature
response: "“Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.”" - Albert Einstein

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about books
response: "“So many books, so little time.”" - Frank Zappa

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about books
response: "“A room without books is like a body without a soul.”" - Marcus Tullius Cicero

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about ataraxy
response: "“Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.”" - Bernard M. Baruch

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about dance
response: "“You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching,Love like you'll never be hurt,Sing like there's nobody listening,And live like it's heaven on earth.”" - William W. Purkey

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about dreams
response: "“You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.”" - Dr. Seuss

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about humor
response: "“You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.”" - Mae West

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about action
response: "“Be the change that you wish to see in the world.”" - Mahatma Gandhi

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about life
response: "“In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.”" - Robert Frost

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about character
response: "“If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.”" - J.K. Rowling,

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about friends
response: "“Donâ€™t walk in front of meâ€¦ I may not followDonâ€™t walk behind meâ€¦ I may not leadWalk beside meâ€¦ just be my friend”" - Albert Camus

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about lies
response: "“If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.”" - Mark Twain

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about friendship
response: "“Friendship ... is born at the moment when one man says to another "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .”" - C.S. Lewis,

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about friend
response: "“A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.”" - Elbert Hubbard

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about enemies
response: "“Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much.”" - Oscar Wilde

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about life
response: "“To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.”" - Oscar Wilde

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about carpe-diem
response: "“Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.”" - Mahatma Gandhi

prompt: Write an inspirational quote about darkness
response: "“Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.”" - Martin Luther King Jr.,
